issue.title: [CI] Enable sccache on more builds
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17726](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17726). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As a follow up to [ARROW-17021]. Enabling sccache should be as easy as adding the install script to the relevant docker image and the sccache env to the docker-compose service.
